CustomField.description: Pick the reason why a Lead may be Disqualified
CustomField.label: Reason Disqualified

value.fullName: Customer has explicitly requested that we stop contacting them
value.label: Customer has explicitly requested that we stop contacting them

value.fullName: Lead has no needs and therefore would never be a customer (i.e. has absolutely no need for appliances or anything else we offer)
value.label: Lead has no needs and therefore would never be a customer (i.e. has absolutely no need for appliances or anything else we offer)

value.fullName: Bad contact information (i.e. phone and email are non-functional)
value.label: Bad contact information (i.e. phone and email are non-functional)

valueSettings.valueName: Customer has explicitly requested that we stop contacting them
